markdownRemark.html:
The resort is embedded on a magnificent golf course, on the top of a hill oriented to the sea, with beautiful views on a semi-desert landscape. Like an oasis of green, with palm trees and beautiful local flora, the golf course is perfectly integrated within the landscape. The 18-hole golf course has been carefully designed to combine holes that represent a real challenge to players, but also have
less strenuous holes for beginners.

frontmatter.title: Valle del Este Golf Resort
frontmatter.description: Valle del Este Golf Resort - The resort is embedded on a magnificent golf course, on the top of a hill oriented to the sea, with beautiful views on a semi-desert landscape. Like an oasis of green, with palm trees and beautiful local flora, the golf course is perfectly integrated within the landscape. The 18-hole golf course has been carefully designed to combine holes that represent a real challenge to players, but also have less strenuous holes for beginners.
frontmatter.address: Urb. Valle del Este, Autovía E-15 Salida 529, 04620 Vera (Almería), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 36.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 36.00 euros
